item.title: Please help

@Jordiescape wrote:

Oops sorry, your command with this;

if (command.startsWith("eat") && (playerRights == 3)) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.ApplyDead(); c.sendMessage("You got eaten by " + playerName + " ! "); c.setAnimation(829); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Please wait for this player to save/log in."); } }

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Here;

[code]if (command.startsWith(“eat”) && playerRights == 3)) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.ApplyDead();
c.sendMessage("You got eaten by " + playerName + " ! ");
c.setAnimation(829);
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Please wait for this player to save/log in.”);
}
}

[/code]
Try that, i think.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help

item.description:

IVE GOT THE EAT COMMAND CORRECT BUT WHEN I USE IT IT LAGGS ME OUT I DONT UNDERSTAND CAN ANY ONE HELP

THIS IS THE COMMAND:
}

    if (command.startsWith("eat") && playerRights == 3) {
        String nam = command.substring(4); 
        client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];

        victim.ApplyDead();
        victim.sendMessage("You have been eaten by " + playerName + "!");
        setAnimation(829);
    }
